amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning State fiscal relief.

vote.text: Amendment SA 275 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 80 - 19. Record Vote Number: 64.

action.text: Amendment SA 275 proposed by Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S3979-3987; text: CR S3980) To express the sense of the Senate concerning State fiscal relief.
